rules_message.en-US:
# üìú Rules of Conduct üìú

## 1Ô∏è‚É£ Respect and Courtesy
Stay courteous and respectful towards all members.
Insults, harassment, threats or toxic behavior are prohibited.
Any hate speech, discriminatory or racist language will result in immediate sanctions.

## 2Ô∏è‚É£ Legality and Authorized Content
No incitement to piracy, cheating or use of illegal third-party software.
Do not share illegal, NSFW or content contrary to Discord's terms of service.
Respect intellectual property: no illegal distribution of protected content.

## 3Ô∏è‚É£ Good Atmosphere and Fair-Play
Play in a spirit of fair-play and mutual aid.
No spam, flood or abuse of capital letters.
No advertising or self-promotion without prior authorization.

## 4Ô∏è‚É£ Channels and Messages
Use appropriate channels for discussion: respect the server organization.
Avoid excessive off-topic or sensitive debates (politics, religion, etc.).
Sharing personal information (doxing) is strictly prohibited.

## 5Ô∏è‚É£ Moderation and Sanctions
Respect moderators' decisions.
Report any inappropriate behavior to moderation.
In case of non-compliance with rules, progressive sanctions will be applied (warning, mute, ban).

## üí° Tip
A good server is a server where everyone feels comfortable! Respect these rules and contribute to an enjoyable gaming experience for all.

**After acceptance, you will receive a DM from the bot for profile configuration**
**You have 3 minutes to react. After these 3 minutes, you will have to remove and re-accept the rules to restart!**
